name: Wrestle Jumper
description:
This is a simple but full funny casual wrestle game. Please be serious, though it looks ridiculous, but it actually is a wrestle game.

Two gay friends embraced passionate.The game is made of their twitching bodies, the curving legs in any direction and angles,(Do not get to the bottom of it, the character design is exactly like this) and a simple jumping button.

The only one rule of the game is to kick down the opponent, and he will be out if his head hits the ground.

Besides, there owns a double players mode, which is also the essence of the game. You will handle one character separately, believe me, it will have more than 10 times' funny than others.

Don't hesitate to challenge with your good friends, your friendship will be sublimated during the game.


Email: scggameservice@163.com
